course.subject: DSOC
course.course_title: Agriculture, Food, Sustainability and Social Justice

notes.note: Students from all Colleges must submit a CALS Special Studies Form (Available online: http://cals.cornell.edu/academics/registrar/policies/#independent-study). Do not sign into section 601. You will be put in the course after submitting form online.

course.subject: DSOC
course.course_title: CALS NYS Internship Program Independent Study

notes.note: Course is limited to CALS students who participated in the CALS NYS Internship Program the preceding summer.

Previous enrollment in the course to be taught or other appropriate previous training and experience. Students from all Colleges must submit a CALS Special Studies Form (Available online: http://cals.cornell.edu/academics/registrar/policies/#independent-study). Do not sign into section 601. You will be put in the course after submitting form online.

Students from all Colleges must submit a CALS Special Studies Form (Available online: http://cals.cornell.edu/academics/registrar/policies/#independent-study). Do not sign into section 601. You will be put in the course after submitting form online.

course.subject: DSOC
course.course_title: Foundations in Social Research: Comparative Epistemologies

notes.note: Enrollment limited to: graduate students.
Prerequisite: previous course in statistics. Enrollment limited to: graduate students.
A one hour seminar time will be required of all graduate students taking this course for credit. It will be held on Wednesdays, 4:00-5:00 PM.
Enrollment limited to: at least 2nd-year graduate student.
